website_summaries.verdict: A gentle hemp protein powder that gives you increased energy and helps your digestive system function at its best.
pros: 11g of protein and 13g of fiber per serving
Smooth powder that won't get chalky or gritty
cons: You need 4 tablespoons of powder per serving, so the container doesn't last very long

customer_reviews.title: Should bowel movement and beautiful be used in the same sentence?
customer_reviews.text: I have literally tried every form of fiber supplement under the sun! This is the only one that doesn't cause bloating, constipation etc. My bowel movements are beautiful (would Amazon post this if I included a picture?). I just mix it in water first thing in the morning, stirring before each sip to avoid heavy sludge accumulating at the bottom of the glass. It's gritty but I just swish my mouth with water. The End.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Robin

customer_reviews.title: 52% of your daily fiber in one serving! Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. 52% of your daily fiber in one serving - nothing compares! It tastes like grass but swig it down with some apple juice and you'll be fine. No gas or bloating either. I drink it before my workouts or at 7pm with a light supper. I wish there was more than 15 servings in the canister but it's still fair for the price in comparison to the other fiber supplements out there. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found this earlier - high in Protein and high in Fiber.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Blends easy into yogurt or a smoothie in the morning. With the 13 grams of fiber and 11 grams of protein per serving I find that adding this in the morning makes me crave a big lunch way less. Super nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Protein Powder...
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to protein powder for many years. And, it's as high in fibre as many OTC fibre blends. I'm convinced that hemp is the most useful plant on the planet. If our silly gov't. officials would wake up and get a clue, legally grown hemp would drop the price significantly. As it is, I have to ration it.
customer_reviews.author: roj

customer_reviews.title: Great fiber supplement with a dash of protein ;)
customer_reviews.text: If you're not used to a little texture (grit) in your smoothies this may initially be offputting but for someone who regularly makes protein shakes/ smoothies it probably won't be noticeable. It is completely flavorless so I add it to pretty much everything including oatmeal, as you can see. It's s great way to get much needed fiber into your diet plus a host of other vits and minerals. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Try at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry but this cannot be for human consumption unless you're into torturing yourself. If it is meant to be drinkable, why does it not dissolve at all? I only bought it for the lowered price, just to try it out. When I'm feeling extremely *Health Nut*-ish, I mix no more than 2 tablespoons in yogurt and I can eat it due to its *subtle* flavor BUT WITH the crunch similar to coffee ground, ugh! "Unflavored" doesn't mean it doesn't have the taste of whatever it's made of. Oh, I might try adding Chia seeds to disguise the texture next time.
customer_reviews.author: purrfect2210

customer_reviews.title: A Review for Weight Lifters
customer_reviews.text: I lift daily. I've worked my way down from an obese 220 lbs to 26% body fat. Best part, I've kept it off for 3 years. I bounce back and forth between iifym and keto. But, def have a hard time with fiber. Here is the deal... It doesn't taste disgusting. ++ Flavor mixes well with other proteins ++ It is VERY grainy so you'll need an immersion blender - - It's a 4 tbsp serving size - - 110 cals/8 grams of protein - - I got it on subscribe & save for 6$ so I can't complain. Not too sure if I will reorder or not. Mainly, it's the grit.
customer_reviews.author: BRob221

customer_reviews.title: smoothies-baking-yogurt-YUM
customer_reviews.text: i add this to anything that i can add it too. green smoothies, almond-peanut butter-banana smoothies, baking bread (sweet or savory), yogurt-- you name it. then when you finish you can reuse the container which is always nice!
customer_reviews.author: onelove butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The container for 16oz product is too small. It's a tall narrow plastic container with a larger (2o) scoop. Hard to get hand-fingers into container to get the second half of the product. Did NOT seem as effective as other fiber products, especially the Fiber from Meleluca. I dropped Meleluca membership and feel the non member price is not justified. I just didn't get the morning bowel movement as experience with other fiber products. I'll try psyllium seed since it's in most of the other products that give "results".
customer_reviews.author: missinglink

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, easy to use, and blend.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to add to a smoothie for protein. I add scoops to soy yogurt, flax milk, and a fruit in a blender bottle. It is grainy but has no flavor. It looks disgusting, but you can add it to almost anything without adding any flavor. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nebel

customer_reviews.title: Like sand
customer_reviews.text: Good chocolate flavor but awful texture. The hemp fiber does not dissolve, it sits on the bottom of the glass like a spoonful of sand. The cocoa flavor makes it bearable, but not enjoyable (too much sand in my teeth). Precious real estate in my fridge is being taken up by a $14 jar of sand... I don't know how long I'll keep it. I should have bought the finer, less fiber kind, but (not knowing why then as I do now) it was more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: pickyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Vegan Protein!  (just needs larger container option)
customer_reviews.text: After making the switch to a vegan diet I thought chocolate flavored proteins were a thing of the past. I had tried pea protein, which tasted like... pea soup (yuck). I was thrilled when I found this protein, it tastes great and is vegan. My only complaint is that they don't offer a larger size container (Whey usually comes in 3 or 5 lb sizes), making this inconvenient to stock up on.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F

customer_reviews.title: It mixes nothing like whey protein so if texture is a problem for ...
customer_reviews.text: 3/5 because of the taste and texture. It's rough. It mixes nothing like whey protein so if texture is a problem for you I would avoid this one. The taste is bearable but it's a hard swallow. On the other hand, the nutritional content and values are outstanding. So this would be ideal for someone avoiding animal products I'll finish the bottle. Maybe mix it with something that tastes better.
customer_reviews.author: BeeJayDee

customer_reviews.title: dis-gust-ing.
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the most disgusting protein powder I have ever had. I felt like I was drinking a bucket of sand. No flavor can save it. I could not get the after taste out of my mouth, which in turned made me gag all day. I guess if you like the taste of grit and pebbles, with a hint of swamp grass...then this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Pat C.

customer_reviews.title: Great fiber product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed to up my intake of fiber by a lot. I wasn't expecting s great tasting product because this is made from hemp. I wasn't disappointed. The powder is gritty and tastes like a mixture of grass/rope. But this is hemp powder--it should taste like that. I add it to my protein smoothie in the morning and it masks the tastes a bit. Unless you enjoy the taste of rope don't use it on its own.
customer_reviews.author: jp5005

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must whenever I am in the mood to work out (I'm not very consistent, may be two months out of the year). It is very affordable and made from sustainable ingredients. It tastes better than, say, artificial chocolate or vanilla flavors for me. One thing I'd say is it is a bit hard to dissolve since the powder is not very finely milled.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no hidden sweetener
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this in smoothies. It works well with homemade kefir, and dozen fruit. My favorite aspect is there are no additives, sweetener, or fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This protein does have a bitter taste. So I mix it with something with a little flavor. However it’s a great protein powder. Just wish the bottle was filled a bit more
customer_reviews.author: Frances Mensah

customer_reviews.title: Gritties, Not Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new powder to mix into my smoothies and this one has all the qualifications I was looking for so I gave it a try. The problem with this powder is that it does not blend well and has turned my smoothies into gritties. I mix my smoothies with fruit and veggies so the taste is fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Smlstr

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste. I add it to my smoothies. When I mix it in my blender it gets stuck to the bottom and sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S

customer_reviews.title: I use it almost every day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as part of a meal and workout plan to lose fat and gain muscle. It has been a good addition to the plan. I use it for after workout smoothies and it is great! It is a bit grainy but that can be expected from a product that is high in fiber and not over-processed. It has a pleasant flavor and goes great with banana smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Semien

customer_reviews.title: I like the Hemp Protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I like the Hemp Protein powder. I would have given it 5 stars if it had more Protein. I bought it as a Protein powder, but it doesn't have all that much protein. It has lots of fiber though which is great for the digestion. So for that reason I love it. I did buy a different Protein powder though for my morning Protein shake, one that gives me the morning Protein boost that I want. It tastes nice and is not expensive and for the purpose of getting more fiber it's definitely great.
customer_reviews.author: Stardust

customer_reviews.title: Gritty Texture
customer_reviews.text: I love the "Just Hemp" seeds and wanted to try their other products, but the mixability of this powder is sorely lacking, A LOT. The shake comes out gritty and grainy with a shaker or Ninja. I will say the flavor profile is tasty; really good chocolate flavor, but the texture makes it hard to go down overall. I might try to use the powder for baking?
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Harman

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not *horrible*, but not good. I struggled to find any chocolate flavoring, it was pretty tasteless, but also tasted kind of "off". Blended okay, but I had to chug my smoothies so I could get it all down and not have to taste the tasteless ha.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a protein powder like other protein powders, but it was Green and very "planty" tasting. I'm going to use it in my smoothies, but I won't be ordering it again. I wouldn't give it a bad review, but the description should be clearer as to what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: maribe

customer_reviews.title: No true difference between this, and Nutiva
customer_reviews.text: I see no difference between this brand and Nutiva hemp protein, this is cheaper, but is only available as an add on, either way virtually the same product. A very solid protein, mixes easily. I usually throw it in a blender w some almond milk, frozen banana, spinach and peanut butter. It seriously tastes like a dessert milkshake. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Bland Taste
customer_reviews.text: We started out with Arbonne protein powder. I’m now using the Aloha protein powder. This protein powder tastes very bland. Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: bekah

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious, And a Subtle Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a pretty simple vegetarian, low-sweets diet, and I bought this to try coating cut apply slices with it. The chocolate flavor is not over the top, but I have to say that the powder is also not as challky as other protein powders I've tried. I make green smoothies, but usually not sweet versions. This is so understated, with no unpleasant aftertaste, that I would definitely use it for a fruit-and-chocolate smoothie with some subtly flavored greens.
customer_reviews.author: C J Petes

customer_reviews.title: Serious fiber
customer_reviews.text: Taste is hempy, particles are big enough to feel in the mouth. I throw 2 tbsp in a blender with my fruit smoothie each morning and while I can taste it, it's not overpowering. The price is fair, the source is good and this makes a good way to balance my diet without adding things I don't want.
customer_reviews.author: dumbphone

customer_reviews.title: By far the best Chocolate Hemp Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: By far the best organic chocolate hemp protein powder. Those whose taste buds have been chemically eroded by fast food and MSG might have some problem with the taste because there is no artificial flavor enhancers in it. But if your body is clean and your taste buds are functioning properly you will surely agree the taste is EXTRAORDINARY! It's actually too sweet. I mix it 1:1 with Sun Warrior Natural unflavored protein powder for the perfect sweetness and texture!
customer_reviews.author: jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Super tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I love hemp shakes and got this for a breakfast add in to my smoothies. Very good tasting and filling. The only bad is you have to shake it up every time you take a drink or you'll end up with stuff that looks like sand in the bottom...
customer_reviews.author: Bludreams34

customer_reviews.title: Good in the right application
customer_reviews.text: I blend this into my coffee and/or fruit and veggie smoothies almost every day. I switched to this brand after using a different brand for a long time. The other brand (onnit) was very sweet and dissolved perfectly in almost everything you put it in. I switched to this brand because it is close to half the price. I will say that this is much grainier and less sweet. It goes very well in anything creamy enough to suspend the particulates. If its in something too watery (like coffee), your last sip will be a mouthful of sand like material. Overall I am still giving it 4 stars. It's not perfect, but I like the companies practices and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: nice tasting fiber &protein
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use fiber and protein with a good nutty taste
customer_reviews.author: Jmarie G.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I was eager to add hemp to my diet. As always, I try using a much smaller amount than recommended on the label. It's kind of like swallowing sand. I tried letting it soak a bit. Not much better. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: listen to leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good in a shake.. but a bit grainy! I like it
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing this I was worried because.of some of the comments but it's very good other than the grainy feel. I wish they could fix that!! It's not sweet which I love because I can add my own sweetener.
customer_reviews.author: shannon corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend by a Friend
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this product. It gets the job done. Taste is ok, not bad. When blending in a smoothie or shake add liquid then powder so it doesn’t clump. I find mixing with frozen berries hides the flavor the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grainy, earthy but not bad
customer_reviews.text: It is grainy and not super chocolately when mixed in a smoothie but it’s not bad. It has a earthy flavor to it but if you add some sugar or sweetener in a smoothie it pretty much negates it. Overall not bad. I would like to give it 3.5 stars cause that’s what I think it deserves
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I have had just Hemp seeds and really liked them but this is horrible to try to drink
customer_reviews.text: I have had just Hemp seeds and really liked them but this is horrible to try to drink. I absolutely will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jellybeansinuse. 2

customer_reviews.title: If you want to puke buy it
customer_reviews.text: This powder is gross, I mixed it in the morning with my coconut milk by the afternoon I was puking everywhere. I thought it was just a fluke thing or maybe I had a stomach bug, NOPE!!!! Mixed it a few weeks later spent all morning at work puking. Do not buy this it literally makes you sick
customer_reviews.author: Bmitchell173

customer_reviews.title: Non dairy!!
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is that there is no dairy in it, as I cannot eat dairy, and products without dairy are almost umpossible to find. Also, very economical.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gritty
customer_reviews.text: I use protein powder daily. This is one of the least favorite ones that I have tried. The texture is gritty and it doesn't blend very well. The taste is ok. I would probably pick a different product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: NL80

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan...
customer_reviews.text: It was to gritty, and bitter even with flavored almond milk or fruit smoothies. I wanted to like it, but it just didn’t work for me...
customer_reviews.author: fc_girl

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helpful in adding protein to various recipes. Pleasant taste. Did notice there are some sugars added...
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: No blender needed
customer_reviews.text: Taste: green/earthy but not unpleasant. I can drink it straight. Texture: fairly grainy (but smooth) and settles to the bottom of the glass. Does it work: um...yes. What I like most is it mixes without creating clumps you have to chew and slides right down. You can just add it to a water bottle on-the-go.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Davis

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to powder since the last product I used doubled in price. I do wish it had more protein per serving, but it tastes SO GOOD. It does settle/separate a little, but if you use a banana in your shake it pretty much gets rid of that problem. I do 4 TBS of the powder, one banana, ice, and almond milk. It tastes like a milkshake!
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: ... the item I knew it was going to taste bad, well according to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the item I knew it was going to taste bad, well according to the reviews. It does not taste like a milk shake from McDonald's but keep in mind this is good for you. I blended hemp milk, banana, oatmeal, blackberries and peanut butter and it came out pretty good. It doesn't fully mask the flavor of the hemp powder but I don't mind the taste. I know hemp is amazing and a super food, so I'm okay with drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: ECruz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Has a light vanilla taste. Blends well, fine and a scoop in a half is enough for a medium shake. I really enjoy mixing it in with various shakes and it fills me up. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Haven't even tried it yet
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed already and not even opened it yet . It states a 6 pack and just received one . Enough said .
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product but not good to mix in water, a little to grainy for me. I mix in all my food with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Green

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I add to protein mix for extra fiber and vitamins and minerals. Doesn't mix well so before you swallow shake each time.
customer_reviews.author: nahooter

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: Had a friend share she used this product and had great results. I have a daughter with special needs and this product really helps keep her regular. She enjoys the texture and flavor. Nice mild flavor. We stir in yogurt and sprinkle in salads etc. Stir in ice cream, etc. Have purchased multiple times, good price and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Keller

customer_reviews.title: Good Protein and Fiber for Smoothies or Other
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good. Can be a bit sandy if you drink it spoon-stirred. Love to blend it up in my Ninja for my vegetable and fruit smoothies. I recommend puttingand theiras well, and then mix it in to get your protein without meat. :)
customer_reviews.author: Heathathon

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein. Excellent for low FODMAP and people who are sulphur/thiol intolerant. No yucky synthetic vitamins!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi A Romrell

customer_reviews.title: Great for shakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an alternative to ground chia and flax seeds. The hemp protein has a higher protein content than the chia and flax I was using, which is great because no matter how "ground" chia and flax are, they still are pretty knotty in shakes. This also does not add that chalk taste that many plant based powders have. Not sure it adds a vanilla taste to my shakes, but that's not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good, but grassy
customer_reviews.text: The vanilla is definitely an improvement to the original, although the grassy flavor comes through. I don't know if it is just the blenders I have had (tried two different ones with this brand) but the powder doesn't dissipate. It leaves little grassy/chewy bits in the drink. My nutritionist prefers me to have the hemp protein, so I'm not sure if there is a way around this texture.
customer_reviews.author: Babycakes

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I am always happy when my Manitoba Harvest hemp protein powder, with extra fiber, Arrives! I can only digest plant based proteins and have found the Hemp protein powder more palatable than the pea protein and I think that Manitoba Harvest has the best with Amazon having the best price.
customer_reviews.author: michele huston

customer_reviews.title: Left me feeling bloated
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use it for regularity, but i just felt bloated using it so i stopped. My system is sensitive though so it may not happen to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: New Choclate flavor tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This is Hemp Protein so it has always had that Hemp taste - but the new Chocolate flavor actually tastes great. With 9 grams of Fiber, 8 grams Protein and Omegas 3&6 per serving this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like this hemp powder but it’s got an awful taste. I cover it up with other ingredients in my shake
customer_reviews.author: A. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Eh.  Gritty and not so delicious.
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to egg or whey protein powder, but have one kid with an egg allergy and The other with a whey allergy. So I was hoping to find something that didn't cause issues with either. Eh. Its just ok. Doesn't taste horrible. But certainly not delicious either. The texture is pretty nasty. Its like a tough version of finely ground black pepper. And that was blended into a smoothie with a vitamix. Probably won't be buying this again. Not sure where all the positive reviews are coming from.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is the best tasting, plus it is organic which was important ...
customer_reviews.text: Of the hemp protein powders I have tasted, this is the best tasting, plus it is organic which was important to me. I also use Tera's organic whey protein sometimes, which has 22 g of protein per serving, as opposed to 9 g of protein in the hemp powder. It just depends on what you are looking for. If you want a hemp protein, I would recommend Manitoba harvest.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday. I've tried other brands but this one is the best. Amazon has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: terri77

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has fabulous Manitoba Harvest Products
customer_reviews.text: All of the Manitoba Harvest products received from Amazon have been consistently fresh. I have been using their products for quite sometime now. The health benefits are many. I have become a hemp shake wizard and have introduced these delicious products to many.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Yuck and Yuck !
customer_reviews.text: Please cancel auto ship.. I Threw this away ! It was awful! Give it 1 star because I have too! To submit!
customer_reviews.author: myra

customer_reviews.title: I don't like this protein powder as much as Nutiva
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand because the Nutiva Hemp poweder went up in price. I don't like this protein powder as much as Nutiva. This protein powder isn't as finely ground as the Nutiva brand. When I made my protein and fruit shakes, I could feel every little "powder" particle. The taste wasn't too bad and the sugar content is about the same, but all in all, I like my protein powders to be more of a powder and this did not offer that liking.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my morning smoothie
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. Happy to find this vegan product, unflavored is hard to find and the price point is fantastic. I did not have the same experience as other reviewers, the taste was fine (I use about 2 heaping tablespoons per smoothie) and not gritty.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jean

customer_reviews.title: Mild taste and subtle texture
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried this once in my smoothies but the taste is unbelievably mild and the texture isn't bad at all. There is a SLIGHT powdery texture but it doesn't bother me much. Shipment was super quick too! All in all I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Mixed with the right ingredients you can't even taste it. But know it is a hemp and will be thicker and need extra planning to mask taste if it bothers you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A New Staple
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product that I'll continue to order on the regular. The taste is decent and blends well.
customer_reviews.author: Princess yaya

customer_reviews.title: Lack of info
customer_reviews.text: Ok so issues with the product itself but they prob shouldve told me that the expiration is the 30th of this month...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bishop

customer_reviews.title: makes a great dairy free dessert
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to this stuff. It is just sweet enough to be called chocolate, plus it has lots of protein and other healthy stuff. I mostly eat it mixed with a frozen banana in the blender for "ice cream." Yum yum yum. Somewhat grainy, but fine compared to other hemp powders. Be aware that my family does not love it as much as I do, but oh well. I would totally eat this every day.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Just no.
customer_reviews.text: This S**T tastes horrible. I tried to mix it with different liquids and all experiences were bad. Whatever you do, don't mix with hemp milk, it tastes like drunk person vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole w

customer_reviews.title: not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for the flavor or grittiness. I can handle a lot of flavors and I'm not too sensitive to texture, so I can stomach almost anything. But I was so disinclined to take this that I have ended up not using it at all. As it is perishable and requires refrigeration after opening, it's something that you have to really enjoy and use, or else it goes to waste. There are better choices I think in regards to products containing hemp. I really enjoy the Lifetime Life's Basics brand. But this is only my personal opinion! Everyone has different tastes.
customer_reviews.author: nicole outlaw

customer_reviews.title: It looks like I got it after all
customer_reviews.text: I apologize. It looks like I got it after all. I love your product in general. I've used it before. There was just a miscommunication and I was worried because stuff has been stolen before.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Lloyd-Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Good and will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I really like this powder and enjoy that it is vegan. I use it in my chia breakfast puddings, it add great protein and helps to satiate my appetite.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: A great protein product
customer_reviews.text: Very good form of protein. I make a smoothie every day with this hemp protein, frozen organic banana, berries or other fruits and organic coconut or almond milk. Yummy! Hemp protein is course but the banana gives the smoothie and smooth feel. Excellent fiber content. No need for the Smooth Move Tea when you have this for breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Manahu

customer_reviews.title: Yuuummm!
customer_reviews.text: Being that this is a "dark" chocolate HEMP protein, I mixed the fixed scoop with vanilla almond milk and a banana, thinking it would be bitter or bland. To my surprise, the shake tasted like dessert. It was a bit on the caloric side for my liking, so I tried it with just water and now that's how I take it after my workouts. I also made chocolate muffins with this - they were awesome!! I pretty much use this in everything that could use chocolate now.
customer_reviews.author: Eden or Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I make a breakfast smoothie every morning and was looking for a way to add more fiber to help me feel full longer. This doesn't have a bad taste when mixed with soy milk, vanilla protein powder, and three berry blend from Costco. I don't dare try it alone or any other way. I did notice it makes me more gassy but I think anything with a lot of fiber will do that to you.
customer_reviews.author: normtoutzky

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: good value, but tasted too....green for me? I can def. taste the superfoods and not enough vanilla flavor and its gritty even if you blend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Hemp protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of the hemp being healthy, and i use it to make great shakes. I don't like dark chocolate much, but it's ok in my shakes. I also use biotrust milk chocolate which i like the chocolate better. If you like dark chocolate i would RECCOMEND this product as it is healthy. I'm sure i will order it again. I like the fact that it has lots of fiber and few calories. It does have to many carbs and sugar and not much protein, but i'm looking for the hemp and fiber.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Horray for protein powder that does not aggravate my lactose intolerance! This is tasty, smooth, no real gritty feeling at all. I blend it in with almond milk, flax seeds, a banana, and frozen berries. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Organic and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. No added flavorings so it doesn’t change the flavor of whatever you’re adding it to. I use this in everything from smoothies to my morning oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I use the product mainly for the multiple of minerals and vitamins and a protein boost. The taste is mild
customer_reviews.author: John L. Fermoil Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Energized and Regular!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein supplement that helps with all that great fiber. I like this stuff a lot.. every morning keeps me energized and regular. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha W

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw the hemp grains away undrinkable and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: The truth

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand of protein powder. I love the smoothie mixes too. I use this in pancakes, muffins, overnight oats and lots more.
customer_reviews.author: BookBear

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: You want to mix this with something but a good healthy product I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mirkarimi

customer_reviews.title: Good organic Hemp for protein.
customer_reviews.text: Product is organic and mixes well. I would buy this product again, it's a great source of natural plant protein.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Steward

customer_reviews.title: Great in green smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I use it in a green smoothie every day. And since I'm vegan and allergic to legumes, this is the only protein powder I can use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: The best flavored organic hemp protein I've tried
customer_reviews.text: The best flavored organic hemp protein I've tried...and I've tried a lot! Also it seems to give me less gas than Nutiva's products. Pretty sure Nutiva's use of certain sugars can cause gas. As always your mileage may vary (YMMV). The flavor profile of the Chocolate flavor is more on the dark / malty side.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L York

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is now my go-to protein. It doesn't have as much per Tbsp as other types, but the high fiber content and omegas is well worth the trade-off. Does not have any noticeable affect on taste. Great price too, as inexpensive as any bulk protein/fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hughes

customer_reviews.title: I love having an easy way to add extra fiber to ...
customer_reviews.text: This has no real taste, so it hasn't affected the foods I put it in that way. It does look somewhat gross, but that's not a huge deterrent. I love having an easy way to add extra fiber to things.
customer_reviews.author: Cari L Small-Canfield

customer_reviews.title: The Nutiva brand is wayyyyyy better! This stuff does not mix well
customer_reviews.text: The Nutiva brand is wayyyyyy better! This stuff does not mix well, ends up all in the bottom of your shake...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pettus

customer_reviews.title: Tastes delish
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually tastes good. I use it on days when I don’t have much of an apetite. Has some fiber as well
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Hemp Protein
customer_reviews.text: While I like dark choclate and I believe it is health friendly, I was disappointed that the powder I bought does no dissolve completely in my hot coffee. There is almost an equal amount of residue grains as in the spoon serving. I feel I am not getting the full impact of the flavor and this is very diappointing. I do no plan to get the powder again unless proper alterations are made.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A.

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the vanilla and the chocolate hemp protein. I simply love the chocolate. It's a little gritty, but all of my smoothies are a little fibrous since I always add greens and berries. With a little crushed ice, the smoothies are delicious. I will order more once my proteins need replenishing. The vanilla is smoother and reminds me of a more traditional protein powder. The vanilla keeps me full also. Both proteins give good energy and fulfill there advertisement..
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, it is a bit grainy, but that's true for any hemp fiber. Overall, the flavor is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Nikki

customer_reviews.title: This is decent but the title calls it protein powder ...
customer_reviews.text: This is decent but the title calls it protein powder which is definitely not. There a small serving if protein in it and lots of fiber and omegas but otherwise not worth your time.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: A ton of bull#$*@ ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Ruin your health with this processed, unhealthy, sugar-stuffed junk food.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale. Wouldn't get again. Gritty. Very gritty. Only in smoothies so I dont notice it
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

product_meta.title: Manitoba Harvest Hemp Yeah! Organic Max Fiber Protein Powder, Unsweetened, 16oz; with 13g of Fiber, 13g Protein and 2.5g Omegas 3&6 per Serving, Keto-Friendly, Preservative Free, Non-GMO
product_meta.description: Flavor:Unsweetened| Size:1 Pound (Pack of 1)Manitoba Harvest Organic Hemp PRO FIBER is packed with 13g fiber per 30g serving. One serving of hemp PRO FIBER represents 52% of the recommended daily intake (RDI) fiber- greater than a similar serving of Metamucil or bran cereal. Fiber is an important part of any diet, aiding in digestive health and helping You feel full longer. Plus, with hemp PRO FIBER you are also benefitting from protein and healthy omegas. Blend into smoothies, or add to baking recipes like you would spelt flour. Made with only organic hemp.
feature_bullets: 13g of Fiber, 13g of Organic Plant-Based Protein, 2.5g Omegas 3&6
Only 1 ingredient - Organic Hemp Protein Powder
Certified USDA Organic, Certified Non-GMO, Vegan, Dairy free
B Corp Certified, Made with renewable energy
MIx with your favorite fruit, greens and avocado to create your own super treat!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
